body:
Comment 6: 
Here's the last bunch of system calls from the process:

12962 12:20:59.592270 mmap(NULL, 65536, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_PRIVATE|MAP_ANONYMOUS,
-1, 0) = 0x7f32fdfc8000
12956 12:20:59.592297 <... select resumed> ) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.592317 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.592432 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.592545 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.592657 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20} <unfinished ...>
12962 12:20:59.592808 open("/etc/localtime", O_RDONLY <unfinished ...>
12956 12:20:59.592819 <... select resumed> ) = 0 (Timeout)
12962 12:20:59.592830 <... open resumed> ) = 6
12956 12:20:59.592842 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20} <unfinished ...>
12962 12:20:59.592853 read(6, "...", 4096) = 118
12962 12:20:59.592889 read(6, "", 4096) = 0
12962 12:20:59.592919 close(6)          = 0
12956 12:20:59.592945 <... select resumed> ) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.592967 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20} <unfinished ...>
12962 12:20:59.593002 write(2, "LONG STRING HERE"..., 4394 <unfinished ...>

this write system call is goroutine 7 in the trace I posted.

so although the goroutine dump shows that it is still busy with the write system call, I
actually believe it has completed.

then it keeps going:

12956 12:20:59.593070 <... select resumed> ) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.593096 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20} <unfinished ...>
12962 12:20:59.593151 <... write resumed> ) = 4394
12956 12:20:59.593195 <... select resumed> ) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.593216 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.593335 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.593453 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.593572 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.593735 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.593855 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.593977 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.594094 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.594211 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.594328 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.594445 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:20:59.594562 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 20}) = 0 (Timeout)

this goes on for a while. then I see:

12956 12:21:14.565255 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 10000}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:21:14.575412 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 10000}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:21:14.585588 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 10000} <unfinished ...>
12955 12:21:14.592410 <... futex resumed> ) = -1 ETIMEDOUT (Connection timed out)
12955 12:21:14.592454 futex(0x9c74d8, FUTEX_WAIT, 0, NULL <unfinished ...>
12956 12:21:14.595751 <... select resumed> ) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:21:14.595785 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 10000}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:21:14.605952 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 10000}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:21:14.616127 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 10000}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:21:14.626322 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 10000}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:21:14.636515 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 10000}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:21:14.646713 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 10000}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:21:14.656899 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 10000}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:21:14.667093 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 10000}) = 0 (Timeout)
12956 12:21:14.677268 select(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, {0, 10000}) = 0 (Timeout)

that looks like the futex associated with the test.timeout=15s firing, but it doesn't
cause anything to happen in the test.
